imdb.plot outline: Hockey Unlimited is a half-hour documentary television series about Canada's proudly self-proclaimed national pastime. This is a show celebrating the culture of hockey, from coast to coast across Canada, and occasionally beyond our borders. The NHL game is, of course, a very significant element of the series, but the show will also include content on hockey from the grassroots up - meaning minor, junior, college/university, recreational beer league, women's, senior amateur, international and all levels of pro hockey.
imdb.title: Hockey Unlimited
plot: _Hockey Unlimited_ (qv) is a half-hour documentary television series about Canada's proudly self-proclaimed national pastime. This is a show celebrating the culture of hockey, from coast to coast across Canada, and occasionally beyond our borders. The NHL game is, of course, a very significant element of the series, but the show will also include content on hockey from the grassroots up - meaning minor, junior, college/university, recreational beer league, women's, senior amateur, international and all levels of pro hockey.::Scot Morison
